page.title: 02ATTITUDES W'BOURNE VALLEY
page.content: General feelings of pleasure that old houses are still being lived in - Winterbourne Steepleton Manor house is now an Old People's Home. Concern over the volume and weight of traffic using B3159 road through village. This road is signposted from A354 Weymouth/Dorchester road as a route to the west avoiding low bridge. Anxiety that, as farms become more automated and need less human labour, the farm cottages used to house farm workers will be sold off and become weekend or holiday homes thus weakening the regular population of the village.
